meanings.definition: The quality or state of being rangy.
meanings.sent1: Her horse's ranginess made it difficult to control during the race.
meanings.sent2: The rancher admired the ranginess of the young colt as it galloped across the field.
meanings.sent3: The ranginess of the giraffe always made the zoo visitors chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The ranginess of the basketball player allowed him to easily score over his opponents.
meanings.sent5: The ranginess of the cat made it an excellent hunter in the wild.

meanings.definition: The extent or range of something.
meanings.sent1: The ranginess of the forest seemed endless as they hiked deeper into the woods.
meanings.sent2: The map displayed the ranginess of the mountain range, showing its vast expanse.
meanings.sent3: The ranginess of the buffet left the guests spoiled for choice.
meanings.sent4: The ranginess of the singer's voice captivated the audience, reaching high and low notes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The ranginess of the ocean's waves was mesmerizing to watch from the shore.
